title: Disgustival
description:
Hold on to your cookies, Wowzers! Join Mindy and Guy Raz on a disgusting adventure at the local Disgustival, the world's grossest art exhibit! While you blow your lunch, learn about the recent scientific research that shows how disgusting videos can make you nauseous! It's the who, when, what, where, why, how and WOW of nausea!

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
